San Martin de los Andes is home to the quartermaster of Lanin National Park, one of the most important protected areas in Argentina. The city of San Martin de los Andes offers a wide range of accommodation, with an architecture based on prevailing local materials of stone and wood. The warmth in the decorations, the attention to every detail and personalized attention. Large windows, logs in household stoves, aromas and crafts pleasantly surprised visitors at each of the environments, and everything comes together to provide warmth and comfort in a unique natural environment. The accommodation consists of five star Hotels, Hosterias (lodges) and Cabañas - Apart hotel (cabins) are distributed harmonically taking advantage of the natural environment, combining the beauty of it with care landscaping. The population of San Martin de los Andes is estimated at 31,000 inhabitants. Its natural environment, allows the development of outdoor activities including fishing, hiking, camping, climbing, rafting, ecotourism, among many others.
